message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on this amazing item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $11000.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. I would like to counteroffer at $10500.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product at $10500. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $10750.
I understand your position, Alice. Let me propose $10600 as my counteroffer.
Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to sell the product at $10600. I'm willing to compromise further and sell it to you for $10800.
Considering our previous discussions, I'd like to propose $10700 as my final counteroffer.
I understand that we're getting close to the end of our negotiation, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $10650, but I'm not willing to go any lower. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your final offer, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, I would like to propose $10600 as my final counteroffer.
I'm disappointed that we couldn't reach an agreement at $10650, Bob. However, I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell the product to you for $10625, but this is my absolute final offer.
I understand your final offer, Alice. Considering all factors, I would like to propose $10600 as my final counteroffer.
